title: Santa-san to Tonakai Kuppi

synonyms: Hello Kitty and Friends: Santa & His Reindeer Kuppi
Hello Kitty and Friends: Santa and His Reindeer Kuppi
alternative_titles.ja: サンタさんとトナカイクッピ

synopsis: Santa is having a race to determine the ten reindeer who will pull his sleigh that year. Kuppi is a young reindeer who wants more than anything to pull Santa's sleigh, and he enters the race.
